jobsJson.descriptionPlain: We are currently seeking a Regional Accountant to be based in our Singapore finance team. The Regional Accountant will be an individual contributor who looks after the full spectrum of finance and accounting activities for several portfolio companies. The Regional Accountant reports to the Regional Finance Manager.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Responsible for payments, receipts and general ledger transactions of portfolio companies
  • Preparation of inter-company schedule, work with Consolidation Accounting to ensure that inter-company transactions and balances agree with Group balances
  • Responsible for month-end closing procedures, including preparation of balance sheet schedules, variance analysis
  • Preparation of trial balance, balance sheet, income statement and financial statements for group reporting requirements 
  • Ensure that all compliance requirements are met (AGM, FS filings, tax filings)
  • Responsible for the budgeting process for portfolio companies 
  • Support the Regional Finance Manager in month-end closing / analysis of subsidiary entities
  • May be required to take on additional portfolio companies as the Group expands
  • Other ad-hoc reporting requirements as required

• Degree in Finance / Accounting 
  • Minimum 3 years work relevant work experience
  • Proficient in SAP FICO
  • Knowledge of Anaplan will be considered favourably
  • Proficient in Office (Powerpoint, Excel, Word)
